name: Spirit Blade: Ghost Strike
effect: Spectral Shift (When you activate this card, you may pay an additional 2. If you do, banish this card as it resolves, then return a crux element card from your graveyard to your hand.) On Attack: You may banish a card from your material deck. If you do, your champion's attacks get +1 until end of turn.
effect_raw:

rule.description: Attack cards resolve as damage is dealt. This means if you paid for the Spectral Shift cost, you would banish this card On Hit, and return a crux element card to your hand.
